abilities.name: Unholy Mechanisms
abilities.rule: While a friendly **DAEMON VEHICLE** unit is within 6" of this model, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit.

abilities.name: Reorder Reality
abilities.rule: Each time an enemy unit within 18" of this model targets this model, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, until the end of the phase, that enemy unitâ€™s ranged weapons have the **[HAZARDOUS]** ability.

abilities.name: Indentured Daemon Engines
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly **DAEMON VEHICLE** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.
